import React, { useContext } from 'react' import diomond from './diomond.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import total from './total.png' import mycontext from './Context/Createcontext' function Navbar() { const {Note}=useContext(mycontext) const sumOfwork = Note.reduce((sum, currentItem) => sum + currentItem.dailywork, 0); return (
HIRADAYRI

:{sumOfwork}

Login Sinup
) } export default Navbar
